Articles.Content:
I stumbled across this today, thought the community might be interested.

http://space.io9.com/win-these-bids-and-build-your-own-historic-spacecraft-498636475

Am I broken in that my first reaction was a very Indiana Jones: "They belong in a museum!"?

Still very awesome.

Am I broken in that my first reaction was a very Indiana Jones: "They belong in a museum!"?

I agree they belong in a museum. Hopefully many will end up on display somewhere.

But imagine fitting the Apollo navball thing to your car!

Edited May 9, 2013 by Tw1
I'd rather have the RHC and THC and wire them up to a USB controller for KSP.

Museums only have so much room, and there is a lot of hardware that's been into space and back. A lot of items like these are already in museums, and it's entirely possible that some of these items are former museum pieces that got replaced with other things.
